column5: I caught a very unique ( to me ) looking brookie this past weekend and got to thinking that most of us here have caught a fish or two that we think is beautiful or unique in its own special way.  Please post yours and give us a line or two as to why you think it is special to you.  Thanks  ........................................................................................................  Here is this past weekends brookie. Note the yellow stripe under its jaw.
Is that what it looks like ??? If so, it is the strangest deformity i have ever seen.
Thats been around for awhile, it's 2 Pike, one small Pike pulled under the larger ones gill plate. Trick picture

40" Muskie caught on a Custom Spiel ultra light pan-fish rod 5', 2 to 4 lb test. #6 snelled hook using 4 lb line. The rod is in the picture bottom right. My buds couldn't believe that we got it in. Caught it Perch fishing at Lowbanks
